conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
film_rank contains tables such as film.
Table film has columns such as film_id, title, studio, director, gross_in_dollar.
conversations.query: Find the titles and studios of the films that are produced by some film studios that contained the word "Universal".
conversations.answer: select title , studio from film where studio like '%universal%';
